extShortDesc.message: Checks is your contributed threads have some new unread responses.
extShortDesc.description: Extension's short description, as it will be seen on the chrome galery page.

errorOnlyInt.description: Error message telling the user only int are to used.

errorMinRefreshTime.message: Be kind with our servers. $MINTIME$ seconds minimum.
errorMinRefreshTime.description: Error message telling the user only int are to used.

REFRESH_TIME_label.description: A label for min refresh time option text box.

MAX_OPEN_ALL_label.message: Max number of tabs open simultaneously without warning:
MAX_OPEN_ALL_label.description: A label for max tabs when open all/open cat.

MAX_OPEN_ALL_label_title.message: When clicking 'Open all' or a cat√©gory, if it triggers more new tabs than this number, you will be prompted for a confirmation.
MAX_OPEN_ALL_label_title.description: A title for max tabs when open all/open cat.

GET_TOPICS_label.description: A label to ask the user whether he want's the extension to tell him how many unread topics he has left.

GET_MPS_label.message: Retrieve nunmber of unread private messages:
GET_MPS_label.description: A label to ask the user whether he want's the extension to tell him how many unread PM he has left.

ONLY_FAVS_label.description: A label to ask the user whether he want's the extension to notify him for bookmarks, or bookmarks+flags.

ONLY_FAVS_label_title.message: If unchecked, refresh contributed threads AND bookmarks.
ONLY_FAVS_label_title.description: A title to explain what ONLY_FAVS will do.

OPEN_TO_FRONT_label.description: A label to ask the user if he wants the links to be open in a new tab.

USE_DIRECT_LINK_label.message: Clicking the icon opens the unread threads page:
USE_DIRECT_LINK_label.description: A label to ask the user what will be the behavior of the browser action.

USE_DIRECT_LINK_label_title.message: If unchecked, a popup is shown.
USE_DIRECT_LINK_label_title.description: A title to explain what USE_DIRECT_LINK will do.

SHOW_CAT_label.message: Display categories' name in the popup:
SHOW_CAT_label.description: A label to ask the user if he wantsto see cat's name in the popup.

OPEN_CAT_label.message: Clicking category's name in the popup opens all category's unread threads.
OPEN_CAT_label.description: A label to ask the user what will be the behavior when he clicks on a cat in the popup.

OPEN_CAT_label_title.message: If unchecked, opens the category's page.
OPEN_CAT_label_title.description: A title to explain what OPEN_CAT will do.

USE_CONTEXT_MENU_label.description: A label to ask the user if he wants to use the context menu.

USE_CONTEXT_MENU_label_title.message: Menu is shown upon right click on a page (along with copy, paste, ...).
USE_CONTEXT_MENU_label_title.description: A title to explain what USE_CONTEXT_MENU will do.

ANIMATED_ICON_label.message: Animate the icon if there are unread threads or private messages:
ANIMATED_ICON_label.description: A label to ask the user if he wants the browser action to move when unread topics are to be read.

NEW_TAB_label.message: Open links in a new tab:
NEW_TAB_label.description: A label to ask the user if he wants the links to be open in a new tab.

NEW_TAB_label_title.message: 'Open all' will ALWAYS open in new tabs.
NEW_TAB_label_title.description: A title to explain what NEW_TAB will do.

BG_COLOR_label.description: A label to ask the user want the main color will be.

setDefaultColor.description: A label to reset the main color to the site's default.

muted_label.description: A label to display muted topics.

DEBUG_ON_label.description: A label to ask the user if he wants the extension in debug mode.

DEBUG_ON_label_title.message: Messages are available in the browser console.
DEBUG_ON_label_title.description: A title to explain what DEBUG_ON will do.

too_many_new_tabs.message: You are about to open $NB_TABS$ tabs. That's a lot. Are you sure?'
